alert.note: Alert for Jones; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 8:48PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones and Shackelford Counties through 930 PM CST... At 847 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Lake Stamford Marina to Nugent to near Hodges. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albany, Hawley, Lueders, Nugent, Fort Griffin, Ibex, Hamby, Mccarty Lake, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us- 283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line and Us- 180 Near The Shackelford-Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
